import React, { Component } from 'react' import InputBase from '@material-ui/core/InputBase'; import Dropdown from 'react-dropdown'; import '../CssFiles/GetStarted.css' const countryOptions = [ { key: 'af', value: 'af', flag: 'af', text: 'Afghanistan' }, { key: 'ax', value: 'ax', flag: 'ax', text: 'Aland Islands' }, { key: 'al', value: 'al', flag: 'al', text: 'Albania' }, { key: 'af', value: 'af', flag: 'af', text: 'India' }, { key: 'ax', value: 'ax', flag: 'ax', text: 'Malaysia' }, { key: 'al', value: 'al', flag: 'al', text: 'New York' }, { key: 'af', value: 'af', flag: 'af', text: 'Afghanistan' }, { key: 'ax', value: 'ax', flag: 'ax', text: 'Aland Islands' }, { key: 'al', value: 'al', flag: 'al', text: 'Albania' }, { key: 'af', value: 'af', flag: 'af', text: 'India' }, { key: 'ax', value: 'ax', flag: 'ax', text: 'Malaysia' }, { key: 'al', value: 'al', flag: 'al', text: 'New York' }, { key: 'af', value: 'af', flag: 'af', text: 'Afghanistan' }, { key: 'ax', value: 'ax', flag: 'ax', text: 'Aland Islands' }, { key: 'al', value: 'al', flag: 'al', text: 'Albania' }, { key: 'af', value: 'af', flag: 'af', text: 'India' }, { key: 'ax', value: 'ax', flag: 'ax', text: 'Malaysia' }, { key: 'al', value: 'al', flag: 'al', text: 'New York' }, ] const states = ["andaman nicobar","karnataka","telangana","tamilnadu"] class GetStarted extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { mobileDigit: "6388064", date: "", value:"India", stateValue:" Choose state" } } componentDidMount = async () => { var date = (new Date()).toLocaleString() date = date.slice(10, 2) await this.setState({ }) console.log("date in mount", date); } dropdownHandle = async(event)=>{ await this.setState({ value:event.target.value }) } stateHandle = async(event)=>{ await this.setState({ stateValue:event.target.value }) } render() { return (
